text: Ojo in fasodkoron va pajravoni rohhoi sajton ʙa'di ʙarpo sudani dalelhoi ravsan muntaziri on hastand, ki ruzi qijomat Alloh ʙo faristagon dar zeri sojaʙone az aʙr nazdason ʙijojad va mijoni ʙandagonas ʙa adl hukm namojad va kor ʙa ancom rasonida savad? Hol on ki hamai korho ʙa sui Alloh ʙarmegardand
